EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-03-17-Big Tech Live.2016-03-04-Big Tech-Q1-Invite.EMAIL-Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for BigTec Live 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
VMTurbo is sponsoring BigTec Live 2016 <[[http://uk.bigtec.com/BigTec-Live-2016-Customer-Landing-Page.html]]> this year! This event is an opportunity to discover the proven, fast, effective way to achieve the best Software Defined Datacentre/Private Cloud for your business with BigTec's Solution Stack.
The event will take place on 17th March 2016 at Euston Square, London. Register here <[[http://uk.bigtec.com/BigTec-Live-2016-Customer-Landing-Page.html]]> to join us and discover how you can:
- Ensure your IT infrastructure will outpace your evolving business needs
- Save time and money on market evaluation- see the results in action
- De-risk and fast-track your transition to private cloud with a solution stack that's been evaluated, pre-defined, proven and is ready to go
Register today <[[http://uk.bigtec.com/BigTec-Live-2016-Customer-Landing-Page.html]]> to fast-track your private cloud initiatives with this risk free approach and learn more about how VMTurbo's technology can help you control any workload on any infrastructure to assure application performance, while maximizing efficiency. Click here <[[http://vmturbo.com/partners/bigtec/]]> to learn more.
Hope to see you there, Karl
Sean Connelly Channel Director- West | VMTurbo
